statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={3.1} , \displaystyle{b}={6.2}, \displaystyle{c}={8.6}, and \displaystyle{d}={9.1}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={7.8}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
